report.title: Blurred PoMS results
report.description: All PomS results. Includes blurred location data. Doesn't use cache attributes so we have multi-lingual support. Note this will only work on BRC Live Warehouse as I had to include hard-coded survey IDs 636, 637, 638, 641
report.query:
SELECT #columns# FROM cache_samples_functional s JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional csnf on csnf.id = s.id LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_functional cof on cof.sample_id = s.id LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional conf on conf.id = cof.id
LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav_cover on sav_cover.id = csnf.id AND sav_cover.sample_attribute_id = #cover_within_patch_attr_id# AND sav_cover.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_cover on ctt_cover.id = sav_cover.int_value LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_cover_lang on ctt_cover_lang.meaning_id = ctt_cover.meaning_id AND ctt_cover_lang.language_iso = '#language#'
LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav_flowers_counted on sav_flowers_counted.id = csnf.id AND sav_flowers_counted.sample_attribute_id = #flowers_counted_attr_id# AND sav_flowers_counted.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_flowers_counted on ctt_flowers_counted .id = sav_flowers_counted.int_value LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_flowers_counted_lang on ctt_flowers_counted_lang.meaning_id = ctt_flowers_counted.meaning_id AND ctt_flowers_counted_lang.language_iso = '#language#'
LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav_flowers_unit on sav_flowers_unit.id = csnf.id AND sav_flowers_unit.sample_attribute_id = #flower_unit_attr_id# AND sav_flowers_unit.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_flowers_unit on ctt_flowers_unit.id = sav_flowers_unit.int_value LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_flowers_unit_lang on ctt_flowers_unit_lang.meaning_id = ctt_flowers_unit.meaning_id AND ctt_flowers_unit_lang.language_iso = '#language#'
LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav_patch_context on sav_patch_context.id = csnf.id AND sav_patch_context.sample_attribute_id = #patch_context_attr_id# AND sav_patch_context.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_patch_context on ctt_patch_context.id = sav_patch_context.int_value LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_patch_context_lang on ctt_patch_context_lang.meaning_id = ctt_patch_context.meaning_id AND ctt_patch_context_lang.language_iso = '#language#'
LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav_cloud_cover on sav_cloud_cover.id = csnf.id AND sav_cloud_cover.sample_attribute_id = #cloud_cover_attr_id# AND sav_cloud_cover.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_cloud_cover on ctt_cloud_cover.id = sav_cloud_cover.int_value LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_cloud_cover_lang on ctt_cloud_cover_lang.meaning_id = ctt_cloud_cover.meaning_id AND ctt_cloud_cover_lang.language_iso = '#language#'
LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav_wind on sav_wind.id = csnf.id AND sav_wind.sample_attribute_id = #wind_attr_id# AND sav_wind.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_wind on ctt_wind.id = sav_wind.int_value LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_wind_lang on ctt_wind_lang.meaning_id = ctt_wind.meaning_id AND ctt_wind_lang.language_iso = '#language#'
LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav_patch_sunshine on sav_patch_sunshine.id = csnf.id AND sav_patch_sunshine.sample_attribute_id = #patch_sunshine_attr_id# AND sav_patch_sunshine.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_patch_sunshine on ctt_patch_sunshine.id = sav_patch_sunshine.int_value LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_patch_sunshine_lang on ctt_patch_sunshine_lang.meaning_id = ctt_patch_sunshine.meaning_id AND ctt_patch_sunshine_lang.language_iso = '#language#'
LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oav on oav.occurrence_id = cof.id AND occurrence_attribute_id = #insect_abund_occ_id# AND oav.deleted = false
#agreements_join# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist# AND s.survey_id in ( #public_fit_count_survey_id#,#1km_fit_count_survey_id#,#fit_count_app_survey_id# ) AND ((trim('#year#') = '' OR '#year#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST('#year#' || '-01-01' as date)) AND (trim('#year#') = '' OR '#year#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST('#year#' || '-12-31' as date))) AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying) = '#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='')

column.name: survey_title
column.sql: case s.survey_id when #public_fit_count_survey_id# then 'FIT Count' when #1km_fit_count_survey_id# then 'FIT Count 1km' when #fit_count_app_survey_id# then 'FIT Count App' else '' END
